sales.routes module¶

sales.routes.display_goods()[source]¶

API endpoint to retrieve a list of available goods.

Returns:

A list of goods with their names and prices.

Return type:

Response (JSON)

sales.routes.get_good_details(good_id)[source]¶

API endpoint to retrieve detailed information about a specific good.

Parameters:

good_id (int) – The ID of the good.

Returns:

The details of the good or an error message if not found.

Return type:

Response (JSON)

sales.routes.process_sale()[source]¶

API endpoint to process a sale.

Requires an Authorization token in the header to identify the user.

Expects:

JSON payload with: - good_id (int): The ID of the good being purchased. - quantity (int): The quantity of the good being purchased.

Returns:

The sale details if successful or an error message otherwise.

Return type:

Response (JSON)

sales.services module¶

class sales.services.SalesService[source]¶

Bases: object

Service class for handling sales-related operations.

This class provides methods for: - Displaying available goods. - Retrieving details of a specific good. - Processing a sale by validating customer and stock availability.

static display_goods()[source]¶

Fetches all available goods with stock greater than zero.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries containing:

  • name (str): The name of the good.

  • price (float): The price per item of the good.

Return type:

list

static get_good_details(good_id)[source]¶

Retrieves details for a specific good.

Parameters:

good_id (int) – The ID of the good to retrieve.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the details of the good.

Return type:

dict

Raises:

ValueError – If the good with the specified ID does not exist.

static process_sale(customer_id, good_id, quantity)[source]¶

Processes a sale transaction.

Parameters:

  • customer_id (int) – The ID of the customer making the purchase.

  • good_id (int) – The ID of the good being purchased.

  • quantity (int) – The quantity of the good to purchase.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the details of the processed sale.

Return type:

dict

Raises:

ValueError – If: - The customer does not exist. - The good does not exist or has insufficient stock. - The customer’s wallet balance is insufficient.
